en: equally (first person singular object pronoun with additive function while repeating the subject)
mine (first person singular possessive pronoun referring back to class 9 nouns)
my (first person singular possessive adjective modifying class 9 nouns)
my (first person singular emphatic possessive adjective modifying class 9 nouns)

ngiemboon: Ndá jù kɔ̌g tɛʼ, e tè páʼ yɔ̀ɔn mɔ́.
en: Your house is small, it's not like mine.
